tn.algorithm

Class ShortestPathRouter

  • java.lang.Object
    • tn.algorithm.ShortestPathRouter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Router
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IncrementalRouter

    public class ShortestPathRouter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Router
    Implements the Router interface. Assumes infinite link capacities, and assumes that link cost is constant at its value when flow is zero. It then routes each user to the initially shortest path. After the shortest path for each pair is located, flows are added to the links
    Author:
    Saleh Ibrahim

    • Method Detail

      • route

        public Assignment route(Demand demand)
        Specified by:
        route in interface Router
        Parameters:
        demand - Demand object containing a map of OD pairs and the corresponding demand volume
        Returns:
        Assignment object containing a map of paths and the corresponding flow in each path. Upon return, the actual flow in the network must remain unchanged
